description: Modifies an existing DMS event notification subscription.

parameters.name: SubscriptionName
parameters.description: The name of the DMS event notification subscription to be modified.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The type of DMS resource that generates the events you want to subscribe to. Valid values: replication-instance | replication-task.

parameters.name: EventCategories
parameters.description: A list of event categories for a source type that you want to subscribe to. Use the DescribeEventCategories action to see a list of event categories. (string) ---

nested_items.name: CustomerAwsId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services customer account associated with the DMS event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: CustSubscriptionId
nested_items.description: The DMS event notification subscription Id.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicArn
nested_items.description: The topic ARN of the DMS event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the DMS event notification subscription.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionCreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the DMS event notification subscription was created.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The type of DMS resource that generates events.

nested_items.name: SourceIdsList
nested_items.description: A list of source Ids for the event subscription.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Boolean value that indicates if the event subscription is enabled.
